The puppeteer wraps the enemy with [[chakra strings]] in an effort to bind and restrict their movements, and then has their [[Water-Firing Puppets|puppets]] spew water onto the opponent. This technique was especially effective on [[Gaara]] as it prevented him from manipulating his [[sand]] which was soaked in water.
